{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the number of demonstrations 1 and y be the number of demonstrations 2.",
    "CONSTRAINTS": 
        "10x + 12y \leq 120 (mint constraint)",
        "20x + 15y \leq 100 (active ingredient constraint)",
        "5x + 3y \leq 50 (black tar constraint)",
        "x, y \geq 0 (non-negativity constraint)",
    "OBJECTIVE": "Maximize 25x + 18y (amount of minty foam produced)"
}
